thread.section_title: NamasteVapes Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NamasteVapes Australia | namastevaporizers.com.au
thread.title: Faye Redmond
thread.title_full: NamasteVapes Australia reviewed by Faye Redmond

author: Faye Redmond
title: Faye Redmond
text: Very happy with my recent purchase which will undoubtedly help me give up smoking both herb and tobacco. Only one downfall is that it overheats and turns off within minutes of use. Also having to charge it every hour can be a pain but in saying that a few hits is really all that is needed for full effect. Very satisfied indeed.
